word:
MR No. 203 - Material for Spirit of Prophecy Emphasis Week in SDA Schools

            General Topic -- "Ellen G. White and the Worldwide Work" 

     Day One: The proposed journey across the plains and the voyage upon the broad waters to the old country was, to me, a matter of dread, but it was the will of the General Conference for me to visit Europe."--Ms 16, 1885, p. 3. (Diary, July 7-12, 1885.)
